fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 166.39 lakh crore compared with Rs 224.90 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 146.95 points or 0.85% to settle at 17,450.90. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slumped 7.31% to 12.9950. Adani Enterprises, Reliance Industries (RIL) and Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
